metadata.topic: Windows LAPS on-premises issue and fix
metadata.subject: AW: [patchmanagement] Windows LAPS on-premises issue and fix
metadata.email_text_clean:
Hi Vineeth, 
the issue is well described in the thread but I will summarize it. The GPO ADMX
suggest a formatting for the account to fetch the password. 
Unfortunately, we (me, the customer and Microsoft found out) that the
documentation is wrong about the formatting of this SID or domain\user or group. 
This will prevent Windows LAPS from being deployed. 
Best regards, 
Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus 
Senior IT Consultant 
Von:  <
%24535087d0%24f9f19770%24%40chynet.de
metadata.evaluated_keywords: ['prevent windows laps', 'gpo admx suggest', 'microsoft find', 'well describe']
metadata.email_text_original:
Windows LAPS on-premises issue and fix 
Hi Vineeth, 
the issue is well described in the thread but I will summarize it. The GPO ADMX
suggest a formatting for the account to fetch the password. 
Unfortunately, we (me, the customer and Microsoft found out) that the
documentation is wrong about the formatting of this SID or domain\user or group. 
This will prevent Windows LAPS from being deployed. 
Best regards, 
Karl Wester-Ebbinghaus 
Senior IT Consultant 
Von: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/003f01da0db1%24535087d0%24f9f19770%24%40chynet.de
metadata.keywords: ['prevent windows laps', 'gpo admx suggest', 'microsoft find', 'well describe']
